Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate the materials used to make the string telephone device.
The student can demonstrate how sound travels through the string to send messages.
The student can depict a distance between the two students where communication still works.
The student can identify and label parts of the device that are essential to its function.
The student can explain through drawings how the device solves the problem of long-distance communication.
The student can include annotations to describe how people benefit from communicating over distances with technology.
